img_above_text:
![Wukong Wolves 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/92/Wukong_Wolves_12.jpg)
Going left should lead you to another Wolf Swordsworn behind a rock sculpture, and a **Gentian** plant near him that you can harvest.
img_below_text:
Further down by the stream, you can spy a curious sight - a small Rat Guai will be looking around a small stone statue head at the end of the stream, before scurrying out of sight. If you go to check out what he was interacting with, you can touch the stone head to gain the **Skandha of Form** Key Item. Its purpose isn’t known just yet, but might be worth hanging onto…
Head upstream to find another Purple**Lingzhi** by a broken tree, and two Wolf Scouts off to the right of the stream guarding a **Gentian** plant.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Wolves 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/92/Wukong_Wolves_12.jpg)
Going left should lead you to another Wolf Swordsworn behind a rock sculpture, and a **Gentian** plant near him that you can harvest."
        - Following Text: "Further down by the stream, you can spy a curious sight - a small Rat Guai will be looking around a small stone statue head at the end of the stream, before scurrying out of sight. If you go to check out what he was interacting with, you can touch the stone head to gain the **Skandha of Form** Key Item. Its purpose isn’t known just yet, but might be worth hanging onto…
Head upstream to find another Purple**Lingzhi** by a broken tree, and two Wolf Scouts off to the right of the stream guarding a **Gentian** plant."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong* where the player character encounters a small Rat Guai near a stream. The Rat Guai is interacting with a stone statue head, which the player can later inspect to obtain the **Skandha of Form** Key Item. The environment features a forested area with rocks, a stream, and dense foliage, setting the stage for exploration and item discovery.
